description: Test if the system has protection against brute force attacks

vulnerabilities.description: No brute force protection detected after multiple failed login attempts
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Implement account lockout or rate limiting after multiple failed login attempts

description: Test if the system enforces a strong password policy

vulnerabilities.description: Weak password '123456' was accepted during registration
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Implement a strong password policy requiring minimum length, complexity, and common password checks

description: Test if the system has secure session management
